about_the_game:
An Unknown Astronomical Phenomenon occurs, Moon collides with Earth, causing creatures from the dark side of the moon to emerge. Your mission in this game is to tame these beings and save the rest of the planet.

Moon Creatures
These enigmatic beings from the dark side of the moon must be tamed. There are two ways to tame them: capture them with dice or defeat them in battle to show them who's the boss. Once tamed, you can use these creatures to fight other moon creatures.

Construct Buildings
Set in the middle of the sea, where all the Moon Creatures are migrating. You need to construct essential buildings to support your mission of taming the moon creatures and saving the planet. Each building has its own unique utility.

Exploration
Isle of Pochimoon is designed to be fascinating to explore, with players discovering a different island each day.

Turn-Based RPG
Inspired by D&D, Isle of Pochimoon uses a D20 system to make turn-based combat dynamic and full of unpredictable results.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.6GHz or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit operating system is required

  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2.6GHz or similar
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 12

  • Additional Notes: 64-bit operating system is required

short_description: Engage in combat, farm, construct buildings, and discover enigmatic beings from the moon in this open-world, turn-based crafting RPG
